Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: This workflow processes PDF files from a specified directory, reads their contents, extracts data using a PDF reader, maps the data, and creates Salesforce Opportunity records. After successful processing, each PDF is moved to a "Complete" directory.

Properties.Name: Source
Mapping

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="Opportunity">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="IsDeleted" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="AccountId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="IsPrivate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="StageName" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Amount" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Probability" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ExpectedRevenue" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="TotalOpportunityQuantity" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CloseDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Type" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="NextStep" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LeadSource" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="IsClosed" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="IsWon" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ForecastCategory" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ForecastCategoryName" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CampaignId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="HasOpportunityLineItem" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Pricebook2Id" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="OwnerId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CreatedDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="CreatedById" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastModifiedDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastModifiedById" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="SystemModstamp" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastActivityDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="PushCount" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastStageChangeDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="FiscalQuarter" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="FiscalYear" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="Fiscal" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="ContactId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastViewedDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastReferencedDate" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="HasOpenActivity" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="HasOverdueTask" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastAmountChangedHistoryId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="LastCloseDateChangedHistoryId" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__DeliveryInstallationStatus__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__TrackingNumber__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__OrderNumber__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__CurrentGenerators__c" type="xs:string" />
              <xs:element name="flowgear__MainCompetitors__c" type="xs:string" />
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>
Properties.Name: Request
Response
Properties.Value:
<Response>
  <Response>
    <success>false</success>
    <errors>
      <statusCode>JSON_PARSER_ERROR</statusCode>
      <message>Cannot deserialize instance of date from VALUE_STRING value 12 September 2025 or request may be missing a required field at [Source: N/A; line: -1, column: -1][line:-1, column:-1]</message>
    </errors>
    <request>
      <attributes>
        <type>Opportunity</type>
        <referenceId>item0</referenceId>
      </attributes>
      <Name>Fonsly NovaCore Opportunity</Name>
      <Description>Flowgear is integrating Fonsly NovaCore’s core systems to enable real-time data flow, operational automation, and energy asset intelligence.</Description>
      <StageName>Qualification</StageName>
      <Amount>180000</Amount>
      <Probability>15</Probability>
      <CloseDate>12 September 2025</CloseDate>
      <Type>Proposal</Type>
      <OwnerId>0050Y000000KkjzQAC</OwnerId>
      <flowgear__OrderNumber__c>1233548</flowgear__OrderNumber__c>
    </request>
  </Response>
</Response>

Name: Azure DI PDF Read To Salesforce Opportunities
Description: This Workflow processes PDF files from a specified directory, reads their contents, extracts data using a PDF reader, maps the data, and creates Salesforce Opportunity records. After successful processing, each PDF is moved to a "Complete" directory.
